content.rendered:
SECURITY DIRECTOR

Jeremy grew up in Danville, Va. and attended Southeast Missouri State University in Cape Girardeau, Mo. He studied criminal justice and began working in the security industry in 2003.

Before moving to Nashville, Jeremy worked in the greater Chicago area as an area operations manager. Once he relocated to Nashville, he was the district manager for one of the largest security companies in the United States, and ultimately joined Infinity in April 2021 as the security director.

When he isn’t working to keep our clients and guests safe, Jeremy enjoys playing or watching sports (especially football), reading, cooking, and working in his garden.
